text: Once Upon a Scoundrel is a 1974 American-Mexican comedy film directed by George Schaefer and starring Zero Mostel, Katy Jurado and A Martinez.Roberts p.511 ==Cast== * Zero Mostel as Carlos del Refugio * Katy Jurado as Aunt Delfina * A Martinez as Luis Manuel * Pancho Córdova * Priscilla Garcia as Alicia * Xavier Marc * Tamara Garina * Rita Macedo * Abraham Stavans * José Chávez * Chano Urueta * Carlos Nieto * Gastón Melo * Hilda Moreno * Carlos Romano * Aurora Clavel * Alicia del Lago * León Singer * Juan Andres * Aurora Muñoz * Cecilia Camacho * Pepe Gonzales * Arturo Hernandez * Titos Vandis as Dr. Fernandez ==See also== * List of American films of 1974 ==References== == Bibliography == * Roberts, Jerry.
